activities.name: Create Schema If Not Exists
activities.description: This activity creates the schema, if not exists. The name of the schema is specified in the pipeline parameter 'SchemaName".

sqlReaderQuery.value:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}')
BEGIN
EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA @{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}')
select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
ELSE
BEGIN
    select Count(*) from sys.symmetric_keys;
END
